messaging.views¶

Classes¶

MessageViewSet

A viewset that provides default create(), retrieve(), update(),

Module Contents¶

class messaging.views.MessageViewSet(**kwargs)¶

Bases: rest_framework.viewsets.ModelViewSet

A viewset that provides default create(), retrieve(), update(), partial_update(), destroy() and list() actions.

serializer_class¶
permission_classes¶
get_queryset()¶

This ensures that only the messages where the logged-in user is either the recipient or the sender are returned.

sent_param¶
received_param¶
list(request, *args, **kwargs)¶

List messages for the logged-in user. Use query params to filter sent, received, or unread messages.

create(request, *args, **kwargs)¶

Create a new message for the logged-in user. Automatically sets the sender to the authenticated user unless it’s a system message.

retrieve(request, *args, **kwargs)¶

Retrieve a message by its ID.

update(request, *args, **kwargs)¶

Update a message by its ID.

partial_update(request, *args, **kwargs)¶

Partially update a message by its ID.

destroy(request, *args, **kwargs)¶

Delete a message by its ID.

trigger_action(request, pk=None)¶
mark_as_read(request, pk=None)¶

Mark a message as read.
